nodes.text: First Republic Medical Academy of Coruscant

The First Republic Medical Academy of Coruscant was the primary medical school within the University of Coruscant, a premier educational institution on the Galactic Republic's capital planet of Coruscant by the time of the Great Galactic War with the Sith Empire. The Human male Archiban Kimble attended the Academy to study xenopathology, though some students claimed that Kimble received favorable treatment from female instructors. One of Kimble's fellow students later went on to become the head of the Republic Health Administration despite his poor performance in medical school.

The Academy was first mentioned in The Holonet, a division of the official site for the BioWare–LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, within the entry for the Jedi Knight companion character Doc—the entry which revealed Doc's real name to be Archiban Kimble. The reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia, released in 2012 further specified that Kimble's medical school had been a division of the University of Coruscant.
